function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population flows at railway stations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to large crowds and close proximity","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, social distancing, and regular disinfection","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, contactless ticketing, UV disinfection systems","People":"Passengers, station staff, surrounding residents","Owner":"Transport authorities, station management"},{"Description":"Long travel time by public transport","Impact":"Extended exposure to infection risks inside public transport vehicles","Mitigation":"Increase frequency of services, improve ventilation, and enforce mask-wearing policies","Technologies":"Real-time tracking systems, air quality monitoring, ticketing systems","People":"Passengers, public transport operators, local government","Owner":"Public transport operators, local government"},{"Description":"High population density around railway stations","Impact":"Intensified potential exposure and transmission via social contacts","Mitigation":"Implement zoning regulations, promote remote working, and enhance public health education","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, telecommuting systems, health education apps","People":"Local residents, commuters, businesses","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, employers, public health institutions"}]}
